Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       The Onyx sailed softly throught the darkening sky, heading for the 
Allience Island. As the ship appraoced, Mortem could clearly see that the 
island looked crowded as it was. She thought for a moment and turned to the 
electric blue face of Tal-X.
       "I want to anchor the Onyx. Get as close to the island as possible." 
She said, tapping a few more commands into the main computer system.
       Tal-X did as he was told. The black and purple ship with the giant 
Predacon Insignia on it clashed into the water sending up curtains for steam 
from its dissent from the heavens. After a few moments of stabilizing and 
pumping water in and out of the vessle, the Onxy was waterbound.
       The Onyx creaked as it moved forward towrds the island that was now in 
front of it rather than below it. The ships were clearly visable from this 
perspective, and Mortem stood at the large bay windows of the bridge as they 
neared.
       "Marvelous. I've only seen these things on data projectors. I do not 
understand why they would fight in such a beautiful place." Mortem said to 
herself.
       Finally, the Onyx came to its resting position next to a tall cliff 
jutting forth from the island. A side portal spiraled open and a ramp slowly 
streached across the 4 meter gap and rested on the sturdy ground of Allience 
Island. The waves splashed agianst the ships bottom, and already crustaceans 
began to attach themselfs to the warm black vessle.
       "Tal, perpare a ground transport and download your main processor into 
the body unit. Youre coming with me." She said, checking herself quickly.
       Opening a communication channle, she sent another message to Zardus. 
"With youre permission, I will come to your base now with my counterpart 
Tal-X. He is an Artificial Intelligence Program that I would be more than 
happy to demonstrate to you once we meet."
       She switched off the communication and waited for the response.

--part1_c5.eb4a994.27dd4a2e_boundary
